name: SokoChess White
description:
What is SokoChess White?

SokoChess White is a unique game in which you must use your wits to navigate each level, moving and pushing pieces on the chessboard until they reach their destination.

Push your own pieces


The goal of each level is to get all the white pieces to their destination.

Beyond Chess


Overcome many unique obstacles before unseen in Chess!



  • 70 handcrafted levels
  • Infinite undos
  • Puzzle elements you won't see in Chess
  • Unique and chill gameplay combining Chess and Sokoban
  • Don't like a level you are playing? Skip it!

Experience Chess like never before!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2185860/SokoChess_White/
